question:
Choose the best article to complete the sentence:
I have ___ apple in my bag.
question_en: I have ___ apple in my bag.
question_zh: 選出正確的冠詞：I have ___ apple in my bag.
answer_zh: 用在母音開頭的單數可數名詞前，故用 an。
explanation_zh: apple 以母音 a 開頭，前面要用 an。

question:
Choose the best article:
She is ___ teacher.
question_zh: 選出正確的冠詞：She is ___ teacher.
answer_zh: 第一次提到的單數可數名詞，前面用 a。
explanation_zh: teacher 以子音 t 開頭，且第一次提到，用 a。

question:
Choose the best article:
My father is ___ engineer.
question_zh: 選出正確的冠詞：My father is ___ engineer.
answer_zh: engineer 以母音 e 開頭，所以用 an。
explanation_zh: 以母音開頭的單數可數名詞前，一般用 an。

question:
Choose the best article:
They live in ___ old house.
question_zh: 選出正確的冠詞：They live in ___ old house.
answer_zh: old 以母音 o 開頭，所以用 an。
explanation_zh: 冠詞看的是後面單字的發音，old /o/，用 an。

question:
Choose the best article:
Tom wants to buy ___ book about history.
question_en: Tom wants to buy ___ book about history.
question_zh: 選出正確的冠詞：Tom wants to buy ___ book about history.
answer_zh: 第一次提到的 book，且以子音開頭，用 a。
explanation_zh: book 為單數可數名詞，第一次提到，用 a。

question:
Choose the best article:
I saw ___ elephant in the zoo yesterday.
question_en: I saw ___ elephant in the zoo yesterday.
question_zh: 選出正確的冠詞：I saw ___ elephant in the zoo yesterday.
answer_zh: elephant 以母音 e 開頭，用 an。
explanation_zh: 以母音開頭的單數可數名詞前，用 an。

question:
Choose the best article:
He is ___ university student.
question_zh: 選出正確的冠詞：He is ___ university student.
answer_zh: university 雖然以字母 u 開頭，但發音是 /juː/，開頭是子音音 /j/，所以用 a。
explanation_zh: 冠詞看的是發音不是字母，university 讀 /juː-/，所以用 a。

question:
Choose the best article:
Lucy has ___ umbrella in her bag.
question_en: Lucy has ___ umbrella in her bag.
question_zh: 選出正確的冠詞：Lucy has ___ umbrella in her bag.
answer_zh: umbrella 以母音 u 開頭，發音 /ʌm-/, 用 an。
explanation_zh: umbrella 發音以母音 /ʌ/ 開頭，所以用 an。
